ClassDesc: - Do not use. This will not be supported in the future. In the future, cursors returned from related queries will be empty. A sub-directory of a single raw contact that contains all of its @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#StreamItems_E@ rows. To access this directory append @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#RawContacts#StreamItems#CONTENT_DIRECTORY_E@ to the raw contact URI. See @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#StreamItems_E@ for a stand-alone table containing the same data. Access to the social stream through this sub-directory requires additional permissions beyond the read/write contact permissions required by the provider. Querying for social stream data requires android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM permission, and inserting or updating social stream items requires android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM permission.
